text: Hagi Ramo'a amanage huno Mosesena asami'ne, menina frinka kagehe'mo'zane manigasa hugahane. E'i anama hanankeno'a ama vahe'mo'za natre'za amama unefraza mopafi, ru anumzantminte monora ome huntegahaze. Hagi Nagrira zamagena hunenami'za zamagranema huhagerafi huvempa kema hu'noana rutagregahaze.
